channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Limit Login Attempts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Limit Login Attempts

item.title: CVE-2021-24657|2024-08-03T19:35:20.431Z -- unknown -- limit%20login%20attempts
item.description: The Limit Login Attempts WordPress plugin before 4.0.50 does not escape the IP addresses (which can be controlled by attacker via headers such as X-Forwarded-For) of attempted logins before outputting them in the reports table, leading to an Unauthenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting issue.
